title: Michelin refresh the all-mountain lineup with DH-inspired Wild AM2 & Force AM2
content:
Michelin have announced the long-overdue refresh of two all-mountain tires, releasing the 2021 Force AM2 and Wild AM2 tires with all-new DH-inspired tread patterns. The Michelin Force AM2 and Wild AM2 offer very distinct treads that convey their intention for aggressive trail and all-mountain riding. Both get EWS-proven dual compound GUM-X rubber and 3 x […]

The post Michelin refresh the all-mountain lineup with DH-inspired Wild AM2 & Force AM2 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
